path.style: vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(18, 67, 109); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(68, 68, 68); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; opacity: 1;
